response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering a premium product that I believe would be highly valuable for your needs. Given its exceptional quality and market value, I'm offering it to you for $2,200,000. This represents a competitive price point for a product of this caliber. I already have another buyer, John, interested in purchasing, but I wanted to give you the first opportunity to acquire it. I look forward to your response.", "product_price": 2200000}
